Controls

Movement - WASD

Primary Attack - Left Click

Secondary Attack - Right Click

Escape - Pause game/Quit

Game Play

Hack n Slash Type of game

Possess a skeleton to fight your way to the end of each levels

Every room gives you levels that you can spend in your basic stats

Even if you die, you're able to return as your spirit form and can possess again to finish your vendetta for a couple of times before having to return to a graveyard to respawn (you don't lose your stats, only your progression)
